result.title: What can we bring to the ACM-ICPC ?
result.content:
I'm so confused , in the 2013 Asia rules they said : Team can bring up to 25 pages of printed materials with them

In the ACM-ACPC Arab regional rules Don't forget_ you can bring_ any printed material to the contest: Books, notes, listings, whatever you like as long as it is not in an electronic format.

BUT in the finals 2014 rules may not bring any printed materials

So what ? can we bring any printed material or not ?

And what about NON-printed material , earplug , food , drink , pillow ? nothing mentioned about them .
